description: Creates a new version of the specified managed policy.
mitreAttackSubTechniques: T1098.003 - Account Manipulation: Additional Cloud Roles

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: By altering IAM policies, attackers can remove access for legitimate users, ensuring only malicious actors maintain control.
By altering permissions with a new policy version, an attacker could restrict or stop critical services within an AWS environment.

securityImplications: Attackers might use CreatePolicyVersion to modify IAM policies, potentially granting themselves elevated permissions.
